name: invitation
subject: You're Invited to Test Bonnenmonster!
body:
Hi {{name}},

You've been selected to join our exclusive beta testing program for Bonnenmonster - the smart receipt scanning app!

As a beta tester, you'll get:

  • Early access to new features
  • Direct line to our development team
  • Free premium subscription after completing the test

Download Bonnenmonster

Your 14-day test period begins once you install the app.

Best regards,
The Bonnenmonster Team

name: welcome
subject: Welcome to Bonnenmonster Beta!
body:
Welcome aboard, {{name}}!

Thank you for joining the Bonnenmonster beta program. Your 14-day test period has officially begun!

What to expect:

  • Day 3: Quick check-in email
  • Day 7: Mid-point survey
  • Day 12: Wrap-up reminder
  • Day 14: Completion & next steps

Have feedback? Share it here anytime!

Happy scanning!
The Bonnenmonster Team

name: day_3_checkin
subject: How's it going with Bonnenmonster?
body:
Hi {{name}},

You've been using Bonnenmonster for 3 days now. How's it going?

We'd love to hear your first impressions:

  • What do you like so far?
  • Anything confusing or frustrating?
  • Features you wish we had?

Share your feedback

{{days_remaining}} days remaining in your test period.

Cheers,
The Bonnenmonster Team

name: day_7_midpoint
subject: Halfway There! Quick Survey
body:
Hi {{name}},

You're halfway through your beta test! ðŸŽ‰

We've prepared a quick 2-minute survey to gather your thoughts:

Take the Mid-Point Survey

Your feedback directly shapes what we build next.

{{days_remaining}} days remaining.

Thanks for being part of this journey!
The Bonnenmonster Team

name: day_12_wrapup
subject: 2 Days Left - Share Your Final Thoughts
body:
Hi {{name}},

Your beta test period ends in 2 days!

Before it wraps up, please share any final feedback:

Submit Final Feedback

We'll be in touch soon about transitioning to our production app with your free premium subscription.

Thank you for your valuable contributions!
The Bonnenmonster Team

name: day_14_completion
subject: Beta Test Complete - Thank You!
body:
Congratulations, {{name}}! ðŸŽŠ

You've successfully completed the Bonnenmonster beta test!

What's next:

  1. We'll process your feedback
  2. You'll receive your free premium subscription within 48 hours
  3. Please install the production version from the Play Store

Download Production App

Thank you for helping make Bonnenmonster better!

With gratitude,
The Bonnenmonster Team

name: reengagement
subject: We Miss You at Bonnenmonster!
body:
Hi {{name}},

We noticed you haven't used Bonnenmonster in a few days. Everything okay?

If you're having any issues, we're here to help:

  • Technical problems? Reply to this email
  • Need guidance? Check our quick start guide
  • Have feedback? Let us know

Your input is invaluable to us. {{days_remaining}} days left in your test period.

Hope to hear from you soon!
The Bonnenmonster Team
